name: PONG! (Ege Gürsel)
description:
My first ever video game! 

This basic local co-op (or a single-player up to your preference :D) project. It was made using C# Unity, and it's sort of my "Hello World" script for game development. It was my first time using Unity Game Engine and coding with C#. I learned so much about game development with this one simple game and I must say, I loved every bit of it! I'm looking forward to improving myself as a game developer and making bigger projects in the future :)
